attributes.additional_details: Call a general election now so the people can decide the fate and future of our country.
attributes.background: The people of this country voted in a referendum back in June 2016 to leave the EU with a majority of 17.4 million votes because of the restrictive Laws and rules that the EU imposed upon us, and the excessive amounts of taxpayer’s money given to the EU and its unelected organisations.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Dissolve Parliament and call a General Election now!
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/750050
